name: COICIO
description:
COICIO™ is the first OTT platform just for verticals like Cars, Boats, Jobs, Travel, Property, etc. COICIO™'s first entrant in Property TV and is the worlds largest property audience, largest property OTT and the fastest-growing, globally. 
PwC has identified that the OTT industry will double in size and value by 2023 and as such, requires a platform to facilitate its growth. COICIO™ is this platform.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Joel Leslie
team.bioHtml: Technology innovator, marketer, business ameliorate, game-changer ...

team.name: Stephen Sharry
team.bioHtml: CEO Raine & Horne Qld, CEO Parklands Gold Coast (Government Statutory Authority), Consultancy Quantum Associates, Chair Person Listr, MD/Founder Propify.

jobs.title: Investor/Partner/Advisor
jobs.description:
Be part of our 3-year plan to provide the industry's first OTT (Over The Top) streaming platform just for all verticals, globally. 

COICIO™ is the first of its kind to provide OTT streaming services specifically for verticals like Cars, Luxury, Travel, Leisure, Property, Boats, etc... 

Property TV is COICIO's first entrant into Streaming and is a successful working business model in its own right. Property TV is now the largest OTT (Over The Top) just for property, globally.

As such, COICIO™ seeks eager parties interested in helping scale the business globally and its full ability to take advantage of industry projections.

Why are we doing this?

A gap in the market exists and is growing rapidly. Consumers are being led by newer role models and are engaging with brands and services differently. 

PwC (Price Waterhouse Cooper) has identified OTT as one of the fastest-growing media segments, forecasting it to double in size and value in the next 3 years to $72.8 Billion. The entire Cable TV/Pay TV sector will be worth $82 Billion, down -2.9% CAGR over the same time.

PwC has identified that newer entrants, such as a Property TV, will most likely contribute to the industry's double growth record, whereby existing services such as Netflix, Hulu, Disney+ will remain on a steady growth stream.

COICIO™'s goal is to provide the platform to meet the substantial increase the industry is set to experience over the next 3 years. COICO™ will offer verticals such as its successful Property TV OTT, each aiming for a minimum of 1% market share.

Collectively, through each of COICIO™'s OTT verticals, the platform will aim to hold 15 verticals (a 15% total market share) over 3-years and we'll do this with good people, our winning strategy and capital.

jobs.title: CFO
jobs.description:
Be part of our 3-year plan to provide the industry's first OTT (Over The Top) streaming platform just for all verticals, globally.

COICIO™ is the first of its kind to provide OTT streaming services specifically for verticals like Cars, Luxury, Travel, Leisure, Property, Boats, etc... 

Property TV is COICIO's first entrant into Streaming and is a successful working business model in its own right. Property TV is now the largest and fastest-growing OTT (Over The Top) for property, globally.

As such, COICIO™ seeks eager parties interested in helping scale the business globally and its full ability to take advantage of industry projections.

We are seeking a full time Start-Up CFO to assist with the company's finance strategy, financial reporting and entrepreneurial thought leadership. You'll join a team of industry leaders, working collaboratively from geographically remote regions, to deliver COICIO™ as a strong and viable business.

Why are we doing this?

A gap in the market exists and is growing rapidly. Consumers are being led by newer role models and are engaging with brands and services differently. 

PwC (Price Waterhouse Cooper) has identified OTT as one of the fastest-growing media segments, forecasting it to double in size and value in the next 3 years to $72.8 Billion. The entire Cable TV/Pay-TV sector will be worth $82 Billion, down -2.9% CAGR over the same time.

PwC has identified that newer entrants, such as a Property TV, will most likely contribute to the industry's double growth record, whereby existing services such as Netflix, Hulu, Disney+ will remain on a steady growth stream.

COICIO™'s goal is to provide the platform to meet the substantial increase the industry is set to experience over the next 3 years. COICO™ will offer verticals such as its successful Property TV OTT, each aiming for a minimum of 1% market share.

Collectively, through each of COICIO™'s OTT verticals, the platform aims to hold 15 verticals (a 15% total market share) over the 3-year period and we will do this with good people, our winning strategy and capital raising.
